Entries.spring_Wed: Hey, @.#$q 3333001/3333002/3333003 q1_fallback#What about you, @? Do you like science and engineering?#$r 3333001 50 q1_r1_yay#Absolutely! I'm a proud nerd#$r 3333002 0 q1_r2_disappointed#Eh, not really my thing, but it's cool you like it!#$r 3333003 -50 q1_r3_hurt#Ew, no. Now that I'm done with school, I hope I never have to think about those again
Entries.spring_Thu: $p 3333001#Hey there fellow nerd!$h|$p 3333002#Hey, what's up?|Oh hey... I won't bore you with any of my science stuff.$s#$e

Entries.q2_talk_too_much: Can I ask you something... Do I talk too much?
Entries.q4_sebastian_hopeless: Do you think it's hopeless to fix things with Sebastian?

Changes.LogName: Daily Dialogue Demetrius - Reactions to Answers

Entries.Event_tomato_no: Ok, hmmm, maybe I can run some tests on them later..$3#$e

Changes.LogName: Daily Dialogue - Fallback Dialogue for already answered Questions

Entries.3{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, if I post a request for someone to smack Morris in his smarmy face, do you think anyone would take it?#$b#I'd do it myself, but that might get me fired.$3#$e#Heh, I'm just kidding.$6#$b#Well, mostly, anyway.$3
